name: SirViWhale - Tutorial/Demo
description:
SirViWhale is a light hearted and adventurous game to fill your evenings after a hard day of work with relaxed and laid back entertainment.

With one out of ten characters you have to survive inside a whale and pass various challenges to escape in the end. 

Variation, RNG and slapstick humor assure long time fun on this wondrous trip and leave you all the freedom to do what you want.

This version is an early prototype. Only some of the mentioned features have been implemented yet and bugs are to be expected. Please leave us some feedback. Have fun!
